user_instruction: 'Tell John to send an email to me (feedback@medtechinnovations.com) with his thoughts on the new patient management system, and remind him to check his Notion for information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Request for Your Feedback on the Patient Management System  

Hi John,

I hope you’re doing well. Could you please send an email to feedback@medtechinnovations.com with your thoughts and any insights you have on the new patient management system? Your feedback is invaluable to us as we continue refining the platform.

Also, when you have a moment, please check your Notion workspace for some additional information that may help guide your comments.

Thank you very much for your time and expertise!

Best regards,  
[Your Name]  
MedTech Innovations

final_output:
